body:
I think there are two simpler ways:
1. use `omp_get_num_threads()` - this is nice, because it can be set by the user if they want to restrict their job to fewer cores
2. [Use C++11 APIs for this](http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/thread/thread/hardware_concurrency`)
